examples.example: 团队合作的作用是巨大的，它能让我们实现一加一大于二的效果。

translate.english: The role of teamwork is huge, and it can enable us to achieve the effect that one plus one is greater than two.

examples.example: 知识在我们的生活中有着至关重要的作用，能帮助我们更好地理解世界。

translate.english: Knowledge plays a crucial role in our life and can help us better understand the world.

examples.example: 良好的心态在我们的人生中有着重要的作用，能让我们更加积极地面对生活中的各种挑战。

translate.english: A good state of mind plays an important role in our life, which can enable us to face various challenges in life more actively.
